name: GetPathPoint

arguments.name: dist
arguments.desc: The distance along path. Should be between zero and result from GetPathLength()

arguments.name: id
arguments.desc: Path planner id. Default value is 0.

returns.name: point
returns.desc: The path point dist meters along the path

description: Return a point along the path for the most recently computed path query. Note that the result can often be retrieved even
if the path query failed. If the target point couldn't be reached, the path endpoint will be the point closest
